testcase.classname: features to test initiate for digital products transaction and risk management functionality
testcase.name: Transaction add to card Functionality
testcase.system-out: Given user on my shopify store page "chrome"................................passed When user is login in to store with "https://dcpulsetxnstg.myshopify.com/" and "plauly".passed And click on enter button...................................................passed When user is navigated to store home page...................................passed And click on catalog........................................................passed When user search and add product in card "digital products X02" quantity 2..passed And click add to card.......................................................passed And click check out.........................................................passed And user fill checkout email or phone from CustomerDetails_XLSX_10.xlsx and 2.passed When user fill billing address from CustomerDetails_XLSX_10.xlsx and 2......passed And click on continue to payment............................................passed When user fill credit card detail...........................................passed And click on pay now button.................................................passed Then user is navigated to digital order detail page.........................passed When user login to vt customer portal "https://vt-customer-stg.azurewebsites.net" user "cehedem117@posiklan.com" and password "PCopperDc@!2611@".passed And navigate to risk management list page...................................passed And search order with order id..............................................passed And click for transaction summary...........................................passed And check attributes positive negative......................................passed Then user logout............................................................passed
